FERTILITY.Definition: the ability to have babies or reproduce

SHRINKING.Definition: becoming smaller or reducing in size

IN VITRO FERTILISATION.Definition: a medical process where an egg is fertilised outside the body

CAESARIAN SECTION.Definition: a surgical process for giving birth through a cut in the belly

ON THE FACE OF IT.Definition: based on what appeared to be true

ROUTINE PROCEDURE.Definition: a common and regular medical process

FALLOPIAN TUBES.Definition: tubes in a woman's body through which eggs pass

OVARIES.Definition: female reproductive organs where eggs are produced

LABORATORY DISH.Definition: a container used in a scientific laboratory

SHOWED EARLY PROMISE.Definition: demonstrated or showed potential or positive signs at an early stage

FERTILISED.Definition: made fertile or capable of producing babies

WOMB.Definition: the organ in a woman's body where a baby develops during pregnancy

OPERATING THEATRE.Definition: a room in the hospital where surgical operations were performed

NO OFFENCE INTENDED TO.Definition: stating that no harm is meant by something said

PIONEER.Definition: a person who was among the first to be born in this way

SNIGGER OVER.Definition: laugh in a disrespectful or mocking manner

UTERUS.Definition: the organ in a woman's body where a baby develops during pregnancy

AS IF BY MAGIC.Definition: in a very surprising or seemingly impossible way

SPERM COUNT.Definition: the number of sperm present in a given sample of semen

ENTER STAGE RIGHT.Definition: come into the situation or scenario

PETRI DISH.Definition: a shallow, flat, cylindrical glass or plastic dish used in laboratory experiments

EMBRYO.Definition: developing and not yet complete baby

SIMPLIFICATION.Definition: a process of making it simpler or easier to understand

EMBRYOS.Definition: developing and not yet complete babies

CYCLE.Definition: a series of processes that are regularly repeated

FACTOR IN.Definition: consider or include as part of the calculation

HOTSPOTS.Definition: areas of intense activity or interest

PLASTERED ON.Definition: attached or affixed firmly to it

TO MAKE MATTERS WORSE.Definition: make the situation even more unpleasant or difficult

INFECTIONS.Definition: diseases caused by bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms

TABOO.Definition: something that was avoided for social reasons

CONSIDERABLY.Definition: to a large extent or significantly

FREEZE.Definition: store them at a very low temperature in order to preserve them

CREATOR-LIKE TERRITORY.Definition: area or realm that reminds us of a creator or god
